title: Reorder apps in menu
content: I can't find info anywhere on how to reorder the apps in the main menu. I don't like lots of apps on my home screen, I just like to use the menu, but the apps are in alphabetical order and I want them in order of most used like I've been able to have on every other phone I've had.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
